modName: Ordinator - Beyond Skyrim Bruma Patch for 32bit Skyrim
summary: A small Ordinator - Perks of Skyrim patch for compatibility with Beyond Skyrim - Bruma's investor dialogue quest.
descriptionHtml:
This is a re-creation based on the patch provided by DruNinja for the SSE versions of Ordinator and BS: Bruma [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/10934/]here[/url] for Oldrim.

The goal of this patch is to provide a conflict resolution between BS: Bruma's modified Investor perk, which integrates it's own equivalent of the investor dialogue quest for Cyrodiil, and Ordinator's own Investor perk. I didn't see a Oldrim version uploaded anywhere yet, so i decided to upload this simple patch for those who can't be bothered, and save the orginal author the trouble.


Credit and Thanks to:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191]EnaiSaion[/url] for creating [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425/?]Ordinator - Perks of Skyrim[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11317178]The Beyond Skyrim Team[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946/?]Beyond Skyrim - Bruma[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10733108/?]DruNinja[/url] for originally creating this patch and brining this to attention
author: JDG
